title: Enchyridion physicæ restitutæ, or, The summary of physicks recovered wherein the true harmony of nature is explained, and many errours of the ancient philosophers, by canons and certain demonstrations, are clearly evidenced and evinced.
author: Espagne, Jean d', 1591-1659.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by W. Bentley, and are to be sold by W. Sheares ... and Robert Tutchein ...,
